comments: Held for Class of 2019. GEOL 120L.54 required. Extra Time required.
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Not open to students who have taken another Geology 100-level course.; GEOL 120L
subject: GEOL
summary: An introduction to geology emphasizing environmental health and humankind's use and abuse of soil, water, fuels, and other resources. Field trips and laboratories included.
title: Introduction to Environmental Geology
